description: As a single mother, Konoe Kagami runs a kissaten (coffee shop) right across the street of their house, and a vegetable garden outside the village where she and her daughter http://anidb.net/ch5078 [Nanami] grow many ingredients for the meals they sell (and their neighbor http://anidb.net/ch5077 [Kenji] often helps with transporting the harvest to their shop). She has a kind and gentle personality. Because of her youthful appearance, she is often mistaken for Nanami`s elder sister.
name: Konoe Kagami
